amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce by $36 million over 5 years the authorization for prison grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce by $7.2 million each year for five years the total authorization for prison grants. The total reduction would amount to $36 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardin amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 295 (Roll no. 113).
